name: Oliver Knight
coverLetter: Grew up in beautiful Humboldt County, CA and have been trimming for about 9 years now. I can trim about a pound and a half in 1 day. I enjoy crafting the medicine for customers in its last stage of production. I am available to work 9am-5pm Monday-Saturday and ready to start November 1st. I also would love to learn other ways of production on the farm as well if that is an option.
contact: Please contact via email at oboynton23@gmail.com
